titles.title: Office of Correctional Health Act of 2000
To amend the Public Health Service Act to establish an Office of Correctional Health.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 5/11/2000--Introduced. Office of Correctional Health Act of 2000 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to establish within the Office of Public Health and Science of the Public Health Service the Office of Correctional Health. Requires the Office to carry out public health activities for employees in Federal or State penal or correctional institutions or for persons incarcerated in such institutions, including disease prevention, health promotion, service delivery, research, and health professions education activities.
